One Minute Rule

by rajiv 17 June 2015

Gretchen Rubin, writes > Try This at Home: The one-minute rule, as a way to keep clutter under control. As noted, I’ve been surprised by the degree to which, for most people, outer order contributes to inner calm.

Happier with Gretchen Rubin

I'd take this brilliant idea even further and make it three minutes—that's a huge amount of time to get lots of things done! You'll be suprised what you can do in three minutes.

If you've not listened to the Happier podcast—have a listen, they are full of some great ideas and thoughts.
